          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Simplified structure of the helix formed by amylose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vereinfachte Struktur der Schnecke bildete sich 
durch Amylose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La structure simplifiée de la spirale a formé 
par l'amylose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A estrutura simplificada da hélice deu forma 
pelo amylose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La struttura semplificata dell'elica ha formato 
dall'amilosio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απλουστευμένη δομή του έλικα που διαμορφώνεται από 
amylose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La estructura simplificada de la hélice formó 
por la amilosis</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the simplified structure of the helix formed by amylose due to the orientation of the 1alpha-4 glycosidic links.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amylose</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">helix structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">link orientation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">simplified structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die vereinfachte Struktur 
der Schnecke, die durch die Amylose wegen der Lagebestimmung der 
Glykosid- Links 1alpha-4 gebildet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la structure 
simplifiée de la spirale constituée par l'amylose due à 
l'orientation des liens 1alpha-4 glycosidiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a estrutura simplificada
da hélice dada forma pelo amylose  devido à orientação das 
ligações 1alpha-4 glycosidic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la struttura 
semplificata dell'elica costituita dall'amilosio dovuto l'orientamento
dei collegamenti glicosidici 1alpha-4.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει απλουστευμένη δομή του 
έλικα που διαμορφώνεται από amylose λόγω στον προσανατολισμό 
των 1αλπχα-4 glycosidic συνδέσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la estructura 
simplificada de la hélice formada por la amilosis  debido a la 
orientación de las conexiones glucosídicas 1alpha-4.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Amylose</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schneckenstruktur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
